name: Odyssey VR
description: Odyssey VR, the innovative operating system by NexaSphere, offers a captivating social media experience in virtual reality. It serves as a gateway to connect, explore, and interact in diverse virtual landscapes, blending elements of social networking with immersive environments.

locations.name: Lobby
locations.description: Your personal VR space in Odyssey VR. This customizable home is where you can display items and memories collected during your virtual adventures. It's a reflection of your style and interests, a personal haven in the expansive digital universe of NexaSphere.

items.name: Virtual Aquarium
items.description: A customizable aquarium with virtual fish. Change scenes at will.

items.name: Zero-Gravity Chair
items.description: A chair that simulates zero-gravity for ultimate relaxation, adjusting to any desired position.

items.name: Holographic Music System
items.description: An interactive music system that visualizes songs as holographic soundwaves and melodies.

items.name: Dimensional Puzzle Cube
items.description: A complex, interactive puzzle cube that changes shape and size, offering a challenging and engaging experience.

containers.name: Cube
containers.description: Store and revisit favorite VR moments.

interactions.description: Open the cube to view its contents.

npcs.name: Athena
npcs.description: Athena, the AI digital assistant, provides guidance, game tips, and helpful information. She appears as a friendly holographic avatar and adapts to the user's preferences.

triggers.name: Central Avalonia
triggers.description:
Central Avalonia Fast Travel Unlocked: 

 Type 'fast travel to avalonia' to go.

triggers.name: Diablo Realm
triggers.description:
Diablo Realm Fast Travel Unlocked: 

 Type 'fast travel to Blizzard World' to go.
triggers.dialog: Thanks for returning my sword to me! In return, I've unlocked the fast travel location for the Diablo Realm. Type 'fast travel to Blizzard World' to go there.

dialog: I hope you're enjoying your time in Odyssey VR.
You're friend has sent you the fast travel location for Central Avalonia.
You can access it by typing 'fast travel to avalonia'.
You can also type 'help' at any time to see a list of commands.
